title: Tahm Kench troll
body: So I had this trolling tahm kept throwing me to enemy team, reported for assisting enemy team, don't think it's gonna do much tho. I read that you can actually choose when to leave, but I'm not sure how. I tried left click, right click, dash. Either I did it wrong or there is a huge delay for that.

replies.body:
I'm pretty sure it was you can choose which way you exit, not when you can leave.
Just from experience though.
